author: altersky
description: It was an exciting day, a zombie idol is about to shake the world, starting from this moment!

author: Yukikaze D
description: Despite her undead appearance, Ollie is proven to be a top tier fastest member in Hololive. This 5-seconds video is the proof.

author: Yukikaze D
description: Ollie's first ever endurance stream, and it's APEX Legends! This marks both her APEX addiction and her massive connection with various VTubers. After all, this stream features Moona Hoshinova, Jaret Fajrianto, Kurono Kureha, Astel Leda, and more!!

author: AkaneDoko
description: Kureiji Ollie opened her YouTube channel membership with a burst of chaotic charm and heartfelt energy, inviting fans to officially become part of the Zomily—her beloved community of supporters.

author: Yukikaze D
eventName: The origin of the joke "Sapi", a joke that makes Ollie laugh for years.
description:
A viewer, Farhan Sarasin, noticed that the auto-generated Indonesia subtitles in Ollie's Zomily Promotional Video said that "Family is all about sharing, you guys can use these 10 cows!"
This particular joke makes Ollie laughs every time "Sapi" is mentioned whenever and wherever for years until it finally subsided and forgotten.
...well, until now.

images.localPath: img/The origin of the joke _Sapi_, a joke that makes Ollie laugh for years._5_1.png

author: Yukikaze D
eventName: One of the Ollie's Shortest Stream Ever.
description: Ollie, as cheeky as she always been, did a "If I die the stream ends". The result? Ummmm...

images.localPath: img/One of the Ollie's Shortest Stream Ever._6_1.png

author: suugakuhakase
eventName: エンヴィーベイビー cover with Astel leda
description: At the time, Ollie and Aster were good friends(?), and she and he posted several cover songs together!

images.localPath: img/エンヴィーベイビー cover with Astel leda_7_1.png

author: Yukikaze D
description: For 500k subscribers' celebration, Ollie took a challenge to eat the thing she can't bear the most: Cabbages. Will she succeed? Tune in and find out!

author: Yukikaze D
eventName: Ollie's first ever solo horror game stream that changes everything - The Hanako Stream.
description: To finish her "a week without APEX" challenge and beating the "APEX addict" allegation, Ollie decides to finally do a horror game for the first time ever. Her pick? Hanako from Chilla's Art. Can she beat the game? (Spoiler: She did in April 29th, 2022).

images.localPath: img/Ollie's first ever solo horror game stream that changes everything - The Hanako Stream._9_1.png
img/Ollie's first ever solo horror game stream that changes everything - The Hanako Stream._9_2.png

author: Yukikaze D
description: In order to spread the great words of mathematics, Ollie opened up a class stream where she explains polynomial divisions. Not only that, she also proves that 1+1 is 2 by using the unusually used successor function DURING A BREAK, which then caught the attention of Bandung Institute of Engineering's Professor!

author: Andrew!
description: Ollie's alternate world / parallel fiction self, Olivia debuted! This is the first opening of Ollie's alternate world portal.

author: suugakuhakase
eventName: Kureiji Ollie Boba shop rap release
description:
Ollie did the lyrics in an hour. Avilon did the song in an hour. Kanauru finished the video in 4 days. They are speed.
Boba shop design based off Ollie's Tweet↓
https://x.com/kureijiollie/status/1424428184313815042?s=20

author: AkaneDoko
description: Kureiji Ollie’s second outfit reveal, a dazzling celebration of Indonesian heritage, fashion, and chaotic charm, inspired by traditional Indonesian and Javanese motifs—complete with vibrant patterns, ceremonial flair, and even bridal aesthetics.

author: Yukikaze D
eventName: Ollie's first ever Birthday Stream, with call-ins from... how many was there again???
description: Ollie's first ever birthday stream is a call-in, where she received calls from a whopping 59 people including the famous CDawgVA, TheAnimeMan, LAM-Sensei, Iida Pochi-sensei, YAGOO, and much much more!!!

images.localPath: img/Ollie's first ever Birthday Stream, with call-ins from... how many was there again__14_1.png

author: nesa
description:
Ollie does a guerilla "Unsubathon" karaoke stream as she nears 1 million subscribers, looking downcast due to her impostor syndrome and asking people to unsubscribe against the zomrade's encouragement and confessions. 
Ollie becomes the 25th Hololive , 2nd holoID, and 1st Holoro member to reach 1 million subscribers on YouTube

images.localPath: img/Hololive Special MEDLLIE by Kureiji Ollie_17_1.png

author: AkaneDoko
description: Mama Lillie’s debut on Ollie’s channel. Streamed on April 1st, 2022, the event was no prank—it was a heartfelt, hilarious, and emotionally rich stream where Ollie introduced her real-life mother to fans.

author: nesa
description: Ollie reveals her 2.0 costume on a freetalk (with an off Collab with Kobo later in the stream), with improved facial and movement tracking!! New pose toggles (arms behind back, arms raised like T-pose) and accessories are now toggle-able (shirt sleeves and sword)

author: suugakuhakase
description: Ollie has done a self-cover of the song "Zombie (DECO*27)," for which she sings the chorus.

author: suugakuhakase
description: Axel, Altare, Vesper, Calliope, Inanis, Kuronii, Reine, Anya, Ollie sung it together.

author: Yukikaze D
description: A special broadcasting program brought to you by YOURS TRULY!!! RadiOllie aired bi-weekly every Wednesday Morning for 12 episodes to accompany your day and fill you in by various news from around the Hololive Sphere!

author: suugakuhakase
description:
Ollie appeared on the (old) hololive official fc video.
It was her first(and last) time appearing on the fc videos.

author: suugakuhakase
description: It was posted to celebrate Holoro 2nd Anniversary delivered by Holoro members — Ollie, Anya, and Reine — blending their unique tones into a vibrant performance.

author: suugakuhakase
description:
This cover song was posted on January 1, holoID 2023 started with a slay cover song by KobOllie!
The Japanese rap by the two of them, KobOllie, is incredibly fluent — it’s a must-see!

description: Every year on this day, the gates to the Ollie-verse open. Sallie made her usual appearance in this stream, but from this day on, Sallie was able to move!

author: genericat
description: Ollie celebrated her birthday with 3D live stream. In this event she revealed a new 3D model called "Goddess of Death and Rebirth". With the new model Ollie looked more majestic when performed on the stage

author: suugakuhakase
eventName: Ollie announced her full name on Twitter
description: Jurard T Rexford announced his long name before Ollie did. Ollie countered by announcing her long name. For a while, they called each other by their full names and wrote their full names on their calendars.

images.localPath: img/Ollie announced her full name on Twitter_40_1.png

author: suugakuhakase
description:
The cover song was posted to celebrate holoro  4th anniversary.
We can see the video on hololive Indonesia ch.
The theme for the 4th anniversary was holoRock, so rock-themed merchandise was also on sale.

author: suugakuhakase
eventName: Ollie's physics lectures become a hot topic
description:
I realized that not many people understand how boobs bounce when you walk, so I created a simple equation to help everyone understand! (Omitted) We're still figuring it out. 
──Kureiji Ollie

December 24th, Koyori picked up this tweet and showed the interview in her morning news stream.

images.localPath: img/Ollie's physics lectures become a hot topic_42_1.png

author: suugakuhakase
description:
Ollie was arrested by Subaru and Hakos in 2024.
Ollie said c**nko in her stream, and she was reported that. The listeners decided Ollie was guilty, and Ollie was arrested.

author: suugakuhakase
description:
Ollie got 1M followers on Twitter. 
She bought a cake for celebrate that.

author: suugakuhakase
description: Ollie stays seiso, while zomrades tries to break her down. After a time extension, zomrades won. She was gifted a jetpack.

author: suugakuhakase
description: All HoloID members participated and the event was well received.Ollie was the host, Iofi, Zeta, and Kaela were the judges, Moona, Risu, Reine, and Kobo were the contestants, and Anya was the question setter.The winner was Risu.

author: suugakuhakase
eventName: Ollie became an ambassador of holoplus!
description: Ollie became an ambassador of holoplus! Ollie has contributed greatly to the development and spread of holoplus by creating the talent tab and proposing the survey and voice note functions!

images.localPath: img/Ollie became an ambassador of holoplus!_51_1.png

author: suugakuhakase
description: Ollie is the first to get a talent account on holoplus. She started her activities in the talent tab! Every time a talent joined holoplus, Ollie drew a picture of that talent.

author: Fedu
description: This event was about a brand new Ollie outfit debuted in september, 2025. Ollie started the stream by showin some fanart predictions before the reveal. Her new, gothic lolita inspired outfit has a mix of red and blue, with blue and black flowers on her headdress. She has a eye patch which can be taken off, a book that she uses to cast spells and a giant Udin plushie. This outfit also revealed a Yandere side from Ollie, but without leaving behind her cuteness as the Kawaii Zombie Idol she is. Together with the outfit, Ollie also revealed her new merch which included a acrylic diorama, a badge, a itabag, a brooch and a voicepack called "Dragon Heir: My Assertive Servant" in english, indonesian and japanese.

author: genericat
description: Ollie presented a 3D live stream for celebrating her birthday in 2025. Carrying the theme about Ollie's feeling toward her audiences the performance showcased a lovely concept, enticing opening, and talented singing
